full_summary:
### CCGS Leonard J. Cowley - VLE DRYDOCK

#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Reference**: PW-__MD-045-28883
* **Purchase Order Number**: F7049-210183/A
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Publication Date**: 14 December 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: 04 April 2023 at 14:00:00

#### Contracting Entity

* **Contracting Entity**: Public Works and Government Services Canada
* **Contact Information**: Bharat Hora, bharat.hora@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, (343) 551-4942

#### Sourcing Strategy

* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Sourcing Strategy**: Sourcing will be limited to suppliers in Eastern Canada Region, in accordance with the Shipbuilding, Refit, Repair and Modernization Policy, and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

#### Description of Requirements

The Government of Canada invites bids for drydocking and related services for the CCGS Leonard J. Cowley. The scope of work includes regulatory dry-docking and certification, renewal of steel, refurbishment of tanks and systems, overhauling of main engines and generators, and miscellaneous surveys.

**Requirements Timeline**

* **Work Commence**: 27 April 2023
* **Work Complete**: 25 July 2024

**Location**

The work will be performed at various locations within the Eastern Canada Region.

**Language of Documents**

Documents may be submitted in either of Canada's official languages.

**Bidder Conference and Site Visit**

A virtual bidders' conference will be held on 17 January 2023 at 10:30 AM NL time. A site visit will take place on 10 January 2023 at the CCG Base, 280 Southside Rd, St. John’s, NL A1E 0A3 between 09:00 AM and 17:00 PM (NL time). Bidders must communicate with the Contracting Authority no later than three (3) working days before the scheduled conference or site visit to confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend.

**Safety Requirements**

Bidders are required to wear safety boots and hard hat while on board the vessel and follow any other CCG requirements and protocols.
